actions.text: On agreeing to the Goss amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 211 (Roll no. 162).
Mr. Serrano demanded a separate vote on the Goss amendment (A009).
On agreeing to the Goss amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 201 (Roll no. 187).

description: Amendment deletes language relating to investigative functions of the Inspector General for the State Department, Arms Control and Disarmament Agency and the United States Information Agency.
purpose: An amendment to strike the bill's provisions which establish new responsibilities for the Office of Inspector General at the State Department.
